name: Hordeum
description:
Short demo of our new action-rpg game! Project in early development stage! 

Made by:
- Dominik Strzałko (SnowyCocoon)
- Tomasz Grzybowski
- Mikita Smaliak

Controls:

"WSAD" - Movement
"LM" - Basic attack
"1" & "2" - Skills
"Alt" - Basic interactions
"E" - Equipment (Backpack)
"R" - Open Brewing Panel
"Y" - Give the beer to the customer

Features in version 1.0 (alpha):
- Semi-Random map generator
- Brewing Panel and Brewing beers
- 2 skills and basic attacks
- 2 basic mobs and Boss
- 2 Biomes
- Equipment (Backpack) with usable items
- Loot from mobs and loot tables
- Customer Service in our pub
- Day Cycle
- Basic interactions with NPC and signs
- and more!
